schemaDescription: run_id: string: Optional search run identifier from search_linkedin_easy_apply()
job_ids: string: Optional explicit list of job IDs to process
limit: string: Optional maximum number of jobs to process (applied after filtering)
enrich_jobs: boolean: Whether to run job-level enrichment (default: True)
generate_answers: boolean: Whether to generate Easy Apply answers (default: True)
force_reprocess: boolean: Re-run enrichment even if the job is already processed
force_answer_regeneration: boolean: Regenerate answers even if they already exist
metadata.actionSignature: action/args: 'run_id: Optional[str]=None, job_ids: Optional[List[str]]=None, limit: Optional[int]=None, enrich_jobs: bool=True, generate_answers: bool=True, force_reprocess: bool=False, force_answer_regeneration: bool=False'
